subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Without Stephon Marbury, the Knicks opened a four-game road trip Tuesday with a makeshift lineup, absorbed a loss, then left town even more depleted and disoriented than when they arrived.
snippet: Without Stephon Marbury, the Knicks opened a four-game road trip Tuesday with a makeshift lineup, absorbed a loss, then left town even more depleted and disoriented than when they arrived.
